# Language systems: 7
# GSUB lookups: 2
# GSUB features: 1 (vert)
# GPOS lookups: 0
# GPOS features: 0

#
# Languagesystem definitions
#

languagesystem DFLT dflt;
languagesystem latn dflt; # Latin default
languagesystem cyrl dflt; # Cyrillic default
languagesystem grek dflt; # Greek default
languagesystem hani dflt; # CJK Ideographic default
languagesystem kana dflt; # Hiragana default
languagesystem kana JAN;  # Hiragana Japanese

#
# Global glyph class definitions
#

# Feature definitions
#

# Glyph class "BASE" already defined

table GDEF {
    GlyphClassDef @BASE,,,;
} GDEF;
